summary: I am a clinical epidemiologist with a doctoral degree from the University of Utrecht in the Netherlands and postdoctoral training at the Karolinska Institute in Sweden. My current work aims to improve understanding on cardio-oncology in women with breast cancer and to improve health outcomes and quality of life of women with breast cancer. My previous research work was on adverse pregnancy outcomes in women with systemic lupus erythematosus and their babies using large national Swedish registries.
